name: Poppy Defense
description:
Get ready to defend your field of dreams in Poppy Defense 🌱, the ultimate top-down tower defense game. Build a garden of defenses and stop the enemy forces from harvesting your precious crop🐛 Can you protect your poppies and come out victorious? Play now to find out!

How To
Place plants to protect against incoming enemies. You can buy more plants or upgrade existing ones by spending Seeds. Seeds are generated by poppies and harvested from eliminated enemies. Place more poppies into the soil (brown tiles) to generate more income and provide more targets for enemies. Game ends when you lose all the poppies.
